thread.section_title: Sports Jobs and Sports Internships - WorkInSports.com
thread.title: Mobile Developer (iOS) - Sports Media

title: Mobile Developer (iOS) - Sports Media
text: The iOS developer will be building and maintaining sports focused applications featuring live broadcast, video on demand, news, and special event related functionality.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
